Text.Line: It's pointless, human. I'm going to make all humans disappear in their sleep
Humanity causes more harm than good: you use each other, destroy the world, and leave little room for each other.
(That's not true, and I can prove it.)
Alright, if you're sure, I'll teleport us to three places where humanity shows its worst.

DialogueOptions.AnswerText: Uh, I'd rather continue my walk.

Text.Line: (Zorg teleports you to the next location.)
Zorg decides to make humanity disappear.
